subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Giannis Adetokunbo, a 6-foot-9 teenager who was born in Greece to struggling Nigerian parents, has impressed N.B.A. scouts with his size and skill.
snippet: Giannis Adetokunbo, a 6-foot-9 teenager who was born in Greece to struggling Nigerian parents, has impressed N.B.A. scouts with his size and skill.
